name: Soul Sellers
description:
Play as a grim reaper determined to be the best at the one thing its good at: harvesting souls and selling them for some cold hard cash! Try to get as much money as you can in Soul Sellers by beating monsters, upgrading your reaper and arena, and risking it all to survive the night (for even more money of course).

Control:

Movement- WASD

Dash- right click

Attack- left click

Charge Attack- hold and release left click

Pause - Esc

Credits:
